abstract: Palestinian Pres Mahmoud Abbas says that the Arab world had erred in rejecting the United Nations’ 1947 plan to partition Palestine into a Palestinian and a Jewish state.
snippet: The Palestinian president, Mahmoud Abbas, said Friday that the Arab world had erred in rejecting the United Nations’ 1947 plan to partition Palestine into a Palestinian and a Jewish state.
lead_paragraph: The Palestinian president, Mahmoud Abbas, said Friday that the Arab world had erred in rejecting the United Nations’ 1947 plan to partition Palestine into a Palestinian and a Jewish state.

headline.main: Arab Rejection of ’47 Partition Plan Was Error, Palestinian Leader Says
headline.print_headline: Arab Rejection of ’47 Partition Plan Was Error, Palestinian Leader Says
headline.seo: Abbas Says Arab Rejection of Partition Plan Was Error
